title: Patient Care Competency Enhancement: Citizen Science Cancer Education Curriculum Based on Self-Determination Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe the data collection and analysis processes in cancer research
Learners achieve over 80% motivation for citizen science participation through storytelling-based case studies
Learners apply Self-Determination Theory (relatedness, autonomy, competence) when developing cancer prevention educational materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
